pipeline.purpose: to obtain a general overview of AI
to fetch and summarize the latest research papers on AI
to gather recent news articles discussing AI advancements and trends
to synthesize information from Wikipedia, Arxiv, and news articles into a detailed and structured answer
pipeline.input: Combine insights from Wikipedia, Arxiv summaries, and news articles to explain AI in detail

plan.reasoning: To provide a comprehensive answer on AI, it is essential to gather information from a general encyclopedia source, academic papers, and recent news articles to ensure the response is up-to-date and well-rounded. Wikipedia will give a broad overview, Arxiv will provide the latest research insights, and news articles will offer current applications and societal impacts of AI. The QA engine will then synthesize this information into a detailed and coherent explanation.
